马来西亚.text: [15-01-26 · 马来西亚] Secretary-General of ASEAN delivers keynote remarks at the China-ASEAN Digital Ecosystem Cooperation Networking Dinner
马来西亚.text_zh: [15-01-26 · 马来西亚] 东盟秘书长在中国-东盟数字生态系统合作交流晚宴上发表主题讲话
马来西亚.summary: Secretary-General of ASEAN, Dr. Kao Kim Hourn, today delivered keynote remarks at the China-ASEAN Digital Ecosystem Cooperation Networking Dinner, on the margins of the 6th ADGMIN in Hanoi, Viet Na
马来西亚.summary_zh: 东盟秘书长高金辉博士今天在越南河内第六届东盟数字部长会议期间，出席了中国-东盟数字生态系统合作网络晚宴并发表了主题讲话。

马来西亚.text: [15-01-26 · 马来西亚] Secretary-General of ASEAN meets with Minister of Foreign Affairs of Viet Nam
马来西亚.text_zh: [15-01-26 · 马来西亚] 东盟秘书长会见越南外交部长
马来西亚.summary: Secretary-General of ASEAN, Dr Kao Kim Hourn, today met with H.E. Le Hoai Trung, Minister of Foreign Affairs of Viet Nam, during his visit to Ha Noi, Viet Nam for the 6th ASEAN Digital Ministers’ M
马来西亚.summary_zh: 东盟秘书长高金辉博士今天在越南河内会见了越南外交部长黎怀忠阁下，进行了一次会谈。

马来西亚.text: [15-01-26 · 马来西亚] Secretary-General of ASEAN meets with ADGMIN Chair and Minister of Science and Technology of Viet Nam
马来西亚.text_zh: [15-01-26 · 马来西亚] 东盟秘书长会见越南科学与技术部长及ADGMIN主席
马来西亚.summary: Secretary-General of ASEAN, Dr. Kao Kim Hourn, today, held a bilateral meeting with H.E. Nguyen Manh Hung, Chair of the 6th ASEAN Digital Ministers’ Meeting (ADGMIN) and Minister of Science and Tec
马来西亚.summary_zh: 东盟秘书长高金辉博士今天与第六届东盟数字部长会议（ADGMIN）主席、科学与技术部长阮孟洪阁下举行了双边会议。

马来西亚.text: [15-01-26 · 马来西亚] Committee of Permanent Representatives to ASEAN, Deputy Secretary-General of ASEAN had a working lunch with Secretary of State for International Development of Canada
马来西亚.text_zh: [15-01-26 · 马来西亚] 东盟常驻代表委员会、东盟副秘书长与加拿大国际发展国务卿举行工作午餐
马来西亚.summary: The Committee of Permanent Representatives to ASEAN (CPR) and Deputy Secretary-General of ASEAN for ASEAN Economic Community today had a working lunch with Secretary of State for International Deve
马来西亚.summary_zh: 东盟常驻代表委员会（CPR）及东盟经济共同体副秘书长今天与国际发展国务卿举行了工作午餐。

industry_observations.text: [15-01-26 · 其他] KKR secures $2.5 billion for second Asia private credit fund
industry_observations.text_zh: [15-01-26 · 其他] KKR为第二只亚洲私人信贷基金筹集25亿美元

industry_observations.text: [15-01-26 · 科技] CapitaLand Integrated Commercial Trust to sell Bukit Panjang Plaza for $428 million
industry_observations.text_zh: [15-01-26 · 科技] 凯德综合商业信托将以4.28亿美元出售武吉班让广场
industry_observations.summary: Sale is aimed at optimising the REIT’s portfolio and giving it greater financial flexibility.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 出售旨在优化房地产投资信托基金的投资组合，并为其提供更大的财务灵活性。

industry_observations.text: [15-01-26 · 科技] Opportunities in S’pore, Asia as venture capital players focus on AI, fintech and healthtech in 2026
industry_observations.text_zh: [15-01-26 · 科技] 随着风险投资者在2026年关注人工智能、金融科技和健康科技，新加坡和亚洲的机会
industry_observations.summary: This is even as fundraising will remain difficult globally.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 尽管如此，全球范围内的筹款仍将面临困难。

industry_observations.text: [15-01-26 · 其他] HSBC considers selling Singapore insurance business: Sources
industry_observations.text_zh: [15-01-26 · 其他] 汇丰考虑出售新加坡保险业务：消息人士
industry_observations.summary: A sale would follow other HSBC disposals in Europe and North America.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 此次出售将继汇丰银行在欧洲和北美的其他资产处置之后进行。

industry_observations.text: [15-01-26 · 其他] MPA offers more LNG bunkering licences to address growing demand for cleaner marine fuels
industry_observations.text_zh: [15-01-26 · 其他] 新加坡海事与港口管理局提供更多液化天然气加注许可证，以应对对更清洁海洋燃料的日益需求
industry_observations.summary: Experts say demand for LNG as marine fuel will grow as more LNG-powered vessels are built.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 专家表示，随着更多液化天然气动力船舶的建造，液化天然气作为海洋燃料的需求将会增长。

industry_observations.text: [15-01-26 · 其他] Singapore farmers head across the border to Johor for cheaper land and energy
industry_observations.text_zh: [15-01-26 · 其他] 新加坡农民跨越边界前往柔佛寻找更便宜的土地和能源
industry_observations.summary: An agriculture hub is emerging as part of the Johor-Singapore Special Economic Zone.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 农业中心正在作为柔佛-新加坡特区的一部分而崛起。

industry_observations.text: [15-01-26 · 其他] BNPL provider Atome secures $444m funding from banks including HSBC, DBS to expand in region
industry_observations.text_zh: [15-01-26 · 其他] BNPL提供商Atome获得包括汇丰、DBS在内的银行4.44亿美元融资，以在该地区扩展业务
industry_observations.summary: The credit facility is up from the US$200 million secured in 2024.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 信贷额度从2024年获得的2亿美元上升。
